languages.text: "В отсутствие Вашей Светлости лицо, известное нам под именем Джай Хейдари, предпринимало активные усилия по вашему розыску. После того, как она связалась со всеми хладными торговцами сектора, она обратилась к персоне, известной как Пощада — весьма влиятельной фигуре в Миссии Касбаллики, имеющей дурную репутацию. Ему была уплачена огромная сумма из ваших средств".

"In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari made a concerted effort to find you. After contacting all the Cold Traders in the sector, Heydari approached an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential and infamous figure in the Kasballica Mission. He was paid an eye-watering sum directly from your own coffers."
languages.original_text: "В отсутствие Вашей Светлости лицо, известное нам под именем Джай Хейдари, предпринимало активные усилия по вашему розыску. После того, как она связалась со всеми хладными торговцами сектора, она обратилась к персоне, известной как Пощада — весьма влиятельной фигуре в Миссии Касбаллики, имеющей дурную репутацию. Ему была уплачена огромная сумма из ваших средств".

After contacting all the Cold Traders in the sector, Heydari approached an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential and infamous figure in the Kasballica Mission. He was paid an eye-watering sum directly from your own coffers."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “大人，您不在的这段期间，我们所知的婕伊·海达利一直在努力寻找您的下落。海达利联系了整个星区的所有冷市商人，随后和一个名叫‘悯慈’的人搭上了线。这个人在卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团中极具影响力，而且声名狼藉。他从王朝国库中支取了一笔令人瞠目结舌的酬劳。”
languages.original_text: "In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari made a concerted effort to find you. After contacting all the Cold Traders in the sector, Heydari approached an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential and infamous figure in the Kasballica Mission. He was paid an eye-watering sum directly from your own coffers."

traits.locale_text: “大人，您不在的这段期间，我们所知的婕伊·海达利一直在努力寻找您的下落。海达利联系了整个星区的所有冷市商人，随后和一个名叫‘悯慈’的人搭上了线。这个人在卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团中极具影响力，而且声名狼藉。他从王朝国库中支取了一笔令人瞠目结舌的酬劳。”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「陛下がご不在の間、我々が現在ジェイ・ヘイダリとして知る人物が、あなたを総力をあげて捜索しました。この宙域におけるすべてのコールド・トレーダーと接触した後、ヘイダリはマーシーという名の人物と接触を図りました。彼はカスバリカ聖務団において大きな影響力を持つ、悪名高い人物です。その人物があなたの国庫から直接、高額な報酬を抜き取っていったのです」
languages.original_text: "In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari made a concerted effort to find you. After contacting all the Cold Traders in the sector, Heydari approached an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential and infamous figure in the Kasballica Mission. He was paid an eye-watering sum directly from your own coffers."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下がご不在の間、我々が現在ジェイ・ヘイダリとして知る人物が、あなたを総力をあげて捜索しました。この宙域におけるすべてのコールド・トレーダーと接触した後、ヘイダリはマーシーという名の人物と接触を図りました。彼はカスバリカ聖務団において大きな影響力を持つ、悪名高い人物です。その人物があなたの国庫から直接、高額な報酬を抜き取っていったのです」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «En ausencia de {mf|milord|milady}, la persona a la que conocemos como Jae Heydari. Tras contactar con todos los representantes del Comercio Frío del sector, Heydari se reunió con una persona influyente conocida como Mercy, que goza de gran influencia e infamia en la misión Kasballica. Recibió una suma exorbitante de las arcas de {mf|milord|milady}».
languages.original_text: "In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari made a concerted effort to find you. After contacting all the Cold Traders in the sector, Heydari approached an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential and infamous figure in the Kasballica Mission. He was paid an eye-watering sum directly from your own coffers."

traits.locale_text: «En ausencia de {mf|milord|milady}, la persona a la que conocemos como Jae Heydari. Tras contactar con todos los representantes del Comercio Frío del sector, Heydari se reunió con una persona influyente conocida como Mercy, que goza de gran influencia e infamia en la misión Kasballica. Recibió una suma exorbitante de las arcas de {mf|milord|milady}».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « En l'absence de Votre Seigneurie, la personne que nous connaissons sous le nom de Jae Heydari a multiplié les efforts pour vous trouver. Après avoir contacté tous les adeptes du Commerce Froid du secteur, Heydari s'est rapprochée d'un individu du nom de Mercy, un membre très influent et notoire de la Mission de la Kasballica. Il a touché une somme colossale provenant directement de vos coffres. »
languages.original_text: "In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari made a concerted effort to find you. After contacting all the Cold Traders in the sector, Heydari approached an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential and infamous figure in the Kasballica Mission. He was paid an eye-watering sum directly from your own coffers."

traits.locale_text: « En l'absence de Votre Seigneurie, la personne que nous connaissons sous le nom de Jae Heydari a multiplié les efforts pour vous trouver. Après avoir contacté tous les adeptes du Commerce Froid du secteur, Heydari s'est rapprochée d'un individu du nom de Mercy, un membre très influent et notoire de la Mission de la Kasballica. Il a touché une somme colossale provenant directement de vos coffres. »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "In Abwesenheit Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} hat die Person, die wir aktuell als Jae Heydari kennen, größere Anstrengungen unternommen, um Euch zu finden. Nachdem Heydari alle Kalthändler im Sektor kontaktiert hatte, wandte sie sich an eine Person namens Mercy, eine sehr einflussreiche und berüchtigte Gestalt in der Kasballica. Sie zahlte ihm eine gewaltige Summe direkt aus eigener Kasse."
languages.original_text: "In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari made a concerted effort to find you. After contacting all the Cold Traders in the sector, Heydari approached an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential and infamous figure in the Kasballica Mission. He was paid an eye-watering sum directly from your own coffers."

traits.locale_text: "In Abwesenheit Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} hat die Person, die wir aktuell als Jae Heydari kennen, größere Anstrengungen unternommen, um Euch zu finden. Nachdem Heydari alle Kalthändler im Sektor kontaktiert hatte, wandte sie sich an eine Person namens Mercy, eine sehr einflussreiche und berüchtigte Gestalt in der Kasballica. Sie zahlte ihm eine gewaltige Summe direkt aus eigener Kasse."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Hâlihazırda Jae Heydari olarak bildiğimiz şahıs, {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin yokluğunda sizi bulmak adına yoğun bir çaba sarf etti. Sektördeki tüm Soğuk Tacirlerle iletişime geçmesinin ardından Kasballica Misyonu'na mensup, son derece büyük nüfuz ve kötü nam sahibi olan Merhamet isminde biri, Heydari'yle temasa geçti. Doğrudan hazinelerinizden aşırı büyük bir miktar ödeme aldı."
languages.original_text: "In Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}'s absence, the person whom we presently know as Jae Heydari made a concerted effort to find you. After contacting all the Cold Traders in the sector, Heydari approached an individual by the name of Mercy, a highly influential and infamous figure in the Kasballica Mission. He was paid an eye-watering sum directly from your own coffers."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nin yokluğunda, hâlihazırda Jae Heydari olarak bildiğimiz şahıs, sizi bulmak adına yoğun bir çaba sarf etti. Sektördeki tüm Soğuk Tacirlerle iletişime geçmesinin ardından, Kasballica Misyonu'ndan, son derece büyük nüfuz ve kötü nam sahibi, Merhamet isminde biri Heydari'yle temasa geçti. Direkt olarak sizin hazinelerinizden göz yaşartıcı derecede büyük bir miktar ödeme aldı."
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
